metadata.title: CVE-2020-25743 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: hw/ide/pci.c in QEMU before 5.1.1 can trigger a NULL pointer dereference because it lacks a pointer check before an ide_cancel_dma_sync call.

advisory.discovered_by: Sergej Schumilo, Cornelius Aschermann, Simon Wrner

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-09-12, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
